title: Voyage
imageCaption: creative direction / brand experience / visual identity / ui / ux / design
description: A Digitally Native Brand Experience for travel planning.
richtext:
A vacation research experience that allows travelers to quickly compare and contrast global destinations and book travel according to their preferences. It leverages user aggregated data and reviews to help inform recommendations.
